EmailTemplate.description: this template is used to send to end user when he got access to a particular application
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Application_Access
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account - Access Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
Thank you for your interest in a Cummins Online Login account. You can now access {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Application_Name__c} application by using your Cummins Username and Password. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. Thank you for your interest in Cummins. Cummins https://cumminsengines.com/customer-care.aspx If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click to here. This auto-generated e-mail invitation is sent from Cummins.
